transformations.name: ConditionalSplit2
transformations.description: Conditionally distributing the data in src_idEjePalanca groups, based on columns '{1}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID_PALANCA as string,
		EJE_PALANCA as string,
		DTM_VIGENCIA_DESDE as date,
		DTM_VIGENCIA_HASTA as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SouExcelMaestroDimEjePalanca
source(output(
		gkEjePalanca as long,
		idEjePalanca as string,
		descEjePalanca as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SouDimEjePalanca
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT CAST(-999 AS VARCHAR(4000)) src_idEjePalanca,\nCAST(\'SIN CLASIFICAR\' AS VARCHAR(4000)) src_descEjePalanca,\nCAST(Null AS DATE) src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca,\nCAST(Null AS DATE) src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca',
	format: 'query') ~> SouDimEjePalancaComodin
SouExcelMaestroDimEjePalanca select(mapColumn(
		src_idEjePalanca = ID_PALANCA,
		src_descEjePalanca = EJE_PALANCA,
		src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca = DTM_VIGENCIA_DESDE,
		src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca = DTM_VIGENCIA_HASTA
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SltExcelDimEjePalanca
Union1 derive(src_descEjePalanca = trim(src_descEjePalanca),
		src_descOrigen = 'EXCEL:DMTD_Plantilla_Maestros:Eje_Palanca') ~> DrcValidacionEspacios
ConditionalSplit2@NOTNULL, SouDimEjePalanca join(src_idEjePalanca == idEjePalanca,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimEjePalanca
JoinDimEjePalanca split(src_idEjePalanca==idEjePalanca,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Match, NoMatch)
ConditionalSplit1@Match alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AltDimEjePalanca
SouDimEjePalancaComodin, SltExcelDimEjePalanca union(byName: true)~> Union1
DrcValidacionEspacios split(isNull(src_idEjePalanca),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(NULL, NOTNULL)
AltDimEjePalanca sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkEjePalanca as long,
		idEjePalanca as string,
		descEjePalanca as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['idEjePalanca'],
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:[' '],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		idEjePalanca,
		descEjePalanca = src_descEjePalanca,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca = src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca = src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca,
		descOrigen = src_descOrigen
	)) ~> SynAtomoUpdateDimEjePalanca
ConditionalSplit1@NoMatch sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkEjePalanca as long,
		idEjePalanca as string,
		descEjePalanca as string,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca as timestamp,
		dtmFechaCarga as timestamp,
		descOrigen as string,
		fkTiposInconsistencia as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		idEjePalanca = src_idEjePalanca,
		descEjePalanca = src_descEjePalanca,
		dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca = src_dtmFechaIniVigenciaPalanca,
		dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca = src_dtmFechaFinVigenciaPalanca,
		descOrigen = src_descOrigen
	)) ~> SynAtomoInsertDimEjePalanca
